title: Wells Fargo’s Quarterly Profit Soars 86%
sub_head: Bank posts revenue up 13%; says it released money set aside for pandemic loan losses
body:
Wells Fargo & Co.’s profit soared 86% in the final three months of 2021.
The San Francisco-based bank said Friday that it made $5.75 billion in the fourth quarter, up from $3.09 billion a year earlier. Per-share profit totaled $1.38, above analyst estimates of $1.11.
